metadata.title: CVE-2019-5860 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Use after free in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 76.0.3809.87 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted PDFfile.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
